It's that time of year again!  The wedding industry tends to call this "Engagement Season"💍 and with good reason. Statistically speaking, most engagements happen between November and February, with Christmas Day being # 1️⃣ AND we are here and ready to make your wedding dreams come true ✨ 📸 @allisondash
Florals, candles & charger 💐🕯🍽 Oh my! Loving this tablescape by @anyvent_eventplanning. How do you envision your tables? 📸 @weddingsbystefanie
Silver lining to these times 🤍 the intimacy of some events with our couples! 📸 @sylviakibler

Find someone who always has your back 🖤🤍 📸 @meganvaughanphoto

Being homebound can be tough - staying as active as you can and setting goals for yourself is extra important right now 💪🏻 We are currently working on a fun project to help quarantined couples still work on planning thier dream days 👏🏼 How are you passing the time? 📸 @aaronwatsonphotography
Just some beautiful mommy-daughter time to make you smile on this homebound Saturday 💚 📸 @paigeryanphoto

For us, our local community, our clients, and our country this has been a week of the unexpected.  A week of changes that we would have never seen coming one month ago.  As we come to the start of another week together, we want to spread a message of encouragment.  Each day, we will continue to take one more step forward, towards a new day, new week, and eventually a new month on the other side of this pandemic.  Until then, we are with you.  We are here to help, spread happiness, and to continue to support our client and vendor families alike ❤️ This too shall pass 📸 @amysmith_photo
Stay calm and kiss your dog 🦮 that's how it goes, right ❓ 📸 @allisonkuhncreative
Swooning for days over the ☀️ lightning captured from this wedding day! 📸 @laurenmorrisphoto
